original_text: The Philistines had sent the gold tumours as an offering to the Lord. They wanted him to forgive them. There was one gold tumour for each of their five towns: Ashdod, Gaza, Ashkelon, Gath and Ekron.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람이 여호와께 속건제물로 드린 금 독종은 이러하니 아스돗을 위하여 하나요 가사를 위하여 하나요 아스글론을 위하여 하나요 가드를 위하여 하나요 에그론을 위하여 하나이며

sentences.original_text: The Philistines had sent the gold tumours
as an offering to the Lord
They wanted him to forgive them
for each of their five towns
Ashdod, Gaza, Ashkelon, Gath and Ekron
sentences.korean_translation: 아스돗, 가사, 아스글론, 가드 그리고 에그론
